summary: Completed frontend testing of the redesigned admin panel with premium white and gold theme. All features working correctly - sidebar navigation, stats cards, bookings table, search/filter, view details modal, edit booking, create booking, and calendar sync.

issues: Google Maps JavaScript API deprecation warning - google.maps.places.Autocomplete will be deprecated, recommend migrating to PlaceAutocompleteElement
Google Maps API loaded multiple times warning - may cause unexpected errors

action_items: Consider migrating from google.maps.places.Autocomplete to PlaceAutocompleteElement (not urgent, deprecation notice says at least 12 months notice will be given)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel redesign fully tested and working. New design features: 1) Collapsible sidebar navigation with Bookings, Deleted, Drivers, Promo Codes, Analytics tabs 2) Clean white background with slate/gray tones 3) Gold/amber accent colors for primary actions 4) Modern card-based stats (Total Bookings, Pending, Confirmed, Revenue) 5) Quick alerts for today/tomorrow bookings 6) Clean table design with hover states 7) Refined modals for booking details. All original functionality preserved.

admin_login.details: Login with admin/Kongkong2025!@ works correctly, redirects to dashboard

sidebar_navigation.details: All 5 tabs working: Bookings (49), Deleted (6), Drivers (1), Promo Codes (1), Analytics. Sidebar collapse/expand works.

stats_cards.details: 4 stats cards display correctly: Total Bookings (49), Pending (31), Confirmed (13), Revenue ($2608)

quick_alerts.details: Today (3 bookings) and Return Trips (1 pending) alerts display correctly with gradient backgrounds

bookings_table.details: Table displays all bookings with proper formatting - Booking ref, Customer, Route, Driver, Status dropdown, Amount, Actions

search_functionality.details: Search by customer name works correctly - searching 'Sarah' filters to show only Sarah Johnson bookings

filter_functionality.details: Status filter dropdown works - filtering by 'Confirmed' shows only confirmed bookings

view_booking_details_modal.details: Modal opens correctly showing Customer info, Trip Details, Payment info, Notes, and action buttons (Edit Booking, Send Payment Link, Cancel Booking)

edit_booking_navigation.details: Edit button navigates to /admin/edit-booking/{id} page with pre-filled booking data

new_booking_navigation.details: New Booking button navigates to /admin/create-booking page with empty form

sync_calendar_button.details: Sync Calendar button is clickable and triggers calendar sync

deleted_tab.details: Shows 6 deleted bookings with Restore and Delete Forever buttons

drivers_tab.details: Shows 1 driver (John Test Driver) with Add Driver button and driver cards

promo_codes_tab.details: Shows promo codes table with XMAS25 (15% discount) and Create Promo button

analytics_tab.details: Shows Booking Status Distribution, Payment Status, Total Revenue ($2607.72), and Google Calendar connection prompt

design_quality.details: Premium white and gold theme implemented correctly - clean white background, slate/gray tones, amber/gold accents, proper spacing and contrast
